Canine Country Club your doggy daycare in China Grove

Welcome to the premier destination for Enrichment-Based Dog Boarding in Salisbury, NC! At our facility, we provide a one-of-a-kind experience for your furry family members. Our dedicated team is passionate about creating a safe and stimulating environment where your dogs can thrive during their stay. From interactive playtime to customized enrichment activities, we ensure that your pet receives the attention and care they deserve.

Our Services

What We Offer

Canine Country Club has services to fit your every need. We guarantee all our services are the best quality in the industry!

Boarding

Sign up today for an exclusive experience in dog boarding luxury at Canine Country Club! Our secure and enriching environment, overseen by our passionate staff, guarantees a worry-free, tail-wagging retreat for your beloved pets.

Daycare

Opt for unmatched canine daycare at Canine Country Club! Our dedicated staff and stimulating environment guarantee a joyful experience for your furry friends. With a commitment to safety and happiness, choose us for a day filled with tail-wagging fun!

Grooming

Elevate your pet's style and well-being with our grooming services! Our expert groomers and personalized care ensure a pampering experience for your furry companions. Trust us for a stylish and happy pet – because they deserve the best!

About Us

Get to know us

Welcome to Canine Country Club, where passion and expertise converge to provide a top-tier experience!

Welcome to Canine Country Club where passion meets expertise

At Canine Country Club, we prioritize enrichment, treat your pets like family, employ passionate and knowledgeable staff, and ensure a worry-free experience. Join us in creating joyful memories for your beloved companions!

Prioritize Enrichment

Immerse your pets in tailored activities that boost their well-being, making each day at our daycare a blend of fun and learning.

Treat your pets like family

Your pets are family, and we treat them as such. With personalized attention and a nurturing environment, we ensure they feel at home and loved.

Passionate Staff

Our devoted team loves dogs and is committed to ensuring a positive and enjoyable experience. Trust us for a happy and tail-wagging stay.

Worry-free Experience

Relax with peace of mind. We uphold top-notch safety and cleanliness standards, ensuring a worry-free experience from drop-off to pick-up.

Our Team

Haley Good

Meet Haley, our dedicated psychology major with a lifelong love for dogs. With a rich background in canine care, she ensures your pets receive the utmost attention and enrichment.

Ron Head

Backing her is Ron, a business management graduate and Haley's right-hand man. With a wealth of experience, Ron plays a pivotal role in customer service, ensuring a seamless experience for you and your furry friends.
